data.title: Get Spanish Football News
data.text:
According to Goal, Martin Braithwaite has an offer from a Serie A club. The Danish striker, who is also of interest to Valencia, could be set to leave Barcelona this …

Manchester City are interested in signing Spanish left-back Marc Cucurella from Brighton, as reported by the Daily Mail. The Premier League side would be willing to pay €35.5 million for …

Speaking to Catalunya Ràdio, FC Barcelona president Joan Laporta has stated that the club would have never signed Kylian Mbappé due to the Frenchman’s extortionate financial demands. Laporta went on …

In another episode of the Anil Murthy leaked audios saga, Valencia president Anil Murthy has questioned the professionalism of the club’s largest shareholder, Peter Lim, as reported by Superdeporte. “We …

Jürgen Klopp has said that the finances involved in signing Kylian Mbappé prevented Liverpool from making a move for the PSG forward. According to David Ornstein of The Athletic, Real …

Real Madrid have reportedly agreed personal terms with Kylian Mbappé. Mbappé will play his last match for PSG against Metz on 21 May, after which he could announce that he …

Over the coming days, Barcelona will meet with Bayern Munich to discuss Robert Lewandowski and the player’s price, according to Mundo Deportivo. Barça’s objective is to sign the Polish striker …

Real Madrid have agreed personal terms with Kylian Mbappé, according to David Ornstein of The Athletic. The PSG forward has not yet signed paperwork with the La Liga champions and …

Getafe president Ángel Torres has voiced his intention to keep Borja Mayoral beyond his current loan spell, which expires at the end of the season. After Getafe’s draw with Barcelona …

Denis Suárez has announced on his social media that he will leave Celta Vigo at the end of the season. The player’s representatives have shared a poor relationship with Celta …

Real Madrid are back in talks for Monaco midfielder Aurélien Tchouaméni, according to Foot Mercato. PSG, Madrid and Liverpool are all possible destinations for the France international. Liverpool boss Jurgen …

Philippe Coutinho officially joined Aston Villa from Barcelona last week. The Athletic has outlined the fees involved in the deal. After lengthy talks with Villa, Barcelona agreed to sell Coutinho …
